message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DB

This paper deals with natural language processing and information retrieval, specifically in the context of multilingual news articles. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses similarity measures and clustering, which are common topics in information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.AI, cs.LG). Finally, the paper deals with data management and linking articles across languages, which could fall under the sub-category of databases (cs.DB).
